text: Chile Olympic football team (also known as Chile under-23, Chile U-23) represents Chile in international football competitions in Olympic Games. Since the 1992 tournament, the team is limited to players under the age of 23, except three overage players. The team is controlled by the Federación de Fútbol de Chile (FFCh). Combined with pre-1992 tournaments, Chile has qualified on four occasions to the Summer Olympics, winning a bronze medal in 2000. ==Pre-Olympic Tournament Record== {| class="wikitable" style="text- =====Semifinals===== =====Bronze Medal Match===== ==Current squad== The following 23 players were called up to play 2020 CONMEBOL Pre-Olympic Tournament. Caps and goals updated as of 18 January 2020 after the match against Ecuador U-23. ==Former squads== * 1928 Summer Olympics squads - Chile * 1952 Summer Olympics squads - Chile * 1988 Summer Olympics squads - Chile * 2000 Summer Olympics squads - Chile ==See also== * Chile national football team * Chile national under-20 football team * Chile national under-17 football team ==References== ==External links== *Chile under-23 at ANFP website Category:Chile national football team Category:South American national under-23 association football teams Category:South American Olympic national association football teams
